gmcm.core.initial:
Hi there! Looks like this is your first time starting MARGO.

Let's begin by choosing the modules you want to enable. Only "Professions" and "Tweex" are enabled by default. Please make sure to read the description pages for each module to learn more about them. When you are done, click on Save & Close.

Note that certain modules may cause a JSON shuffle or other side-effects if enabled or disabled mid-playthrough.
gmcm.core.choose:
Choose the modules to enable. You must save and exit this menu after enabling or disabling a module for those changes to take effect. Links to specific module settings pages will appear below for enabled modules.

Note that certain modules may cause a JSON shuffle or other side-effects if enabled or disabled mid-playthrough.
gmcm.modules.profs.name: Professions
gmcm.modules.profs.desc: A complete overhaul of all skill professions with the goal of supporting more diverse and interesting playstyles. Introducing all-new Prestige mechanics and Limit Breaks.
gmcm.modules.cmbt.name: Combat
gmcm.modules.cmbt.desc: A complete overhaul of the combat experience, from rebalanced stats, weapons--both melee and ranged--, rings and enchantments, to entirely new mechanics like status effects, weapon combos and gemstone resonances.
gmcm.modules.tols.name: Tools
gmcm.modules.tols.desc: A one-stop-shop for tool augmentation, customization and quality-of-life. Adds Radioactive tool upgrades, charging resource tools, automatic tool selection, expanded enchantment pools and more.
gmcm.modules.pnds.name: Ponds
gmcm.modules.pnds.desc: Makes Fish Ponds viable and more interesting, by introducing scaling roe production in both quantity and quality, spontaneous algae growth and radioactive ore enrichment, among other features. Pairs well with the new Aquarist profession.
gmcm.modules.txs.name: Taxes
gmcm.modules.txs.desc: A borderline realistic taxation system for added challenge and end-game gold sink. Pairs well with the new Conservationist profession.
gmcm.modules.twx.name: Tweex
gmcm.modules.twx.desc: A collection of smaller immersion tweaks and fixes for inconsistencies in vanilla.
gmcm.profs.heading: PROFS Module Settings
gmcm.profs.controls.modkey.desc: The key used to enable active effects for some professions (used by Prospector, Scavenger and Rascal).
gmcm.profs.ui.show_fish_collecion_max_ic: Toggles whether or not to display the 'Max' icon below fish caught at max size.
gmcm.profs.ui.tracking_pointer_scale.des: Changes the size of the pointer used to track objects by Prospector and Scavenger professions.
Changes the size of the pointer used to track objects by Prospector and Scavenger professions.
gmcm.profs.ui.disable_always_track.title: Disable Constant Tracking Arrows
gmcm.profs.ui.disable_always_track.desc: If enabled, Prospector and Scavenger will only track off-screen objects while Mod Key is held.
gmcm.profs.general.heading: General Profession Settings
gmcm.profs.should_junimos_inherit_profes: Whether Junimo harvesters should apply Harvester and Agriculturist perks.
gmcm.profs.lax_ownership_requirements.de: If enabled, machine and building ownership will be ignored when determining whether to apply certain profession bonuses (only relevant in multiplayer).
gmcm.profs.artisan_goods_always_input_qu: Enable this if you preferred the old broken Artisan perk without randomization.
gmcm.profs.bees_are_animals.title: Bees Are Animals
gmcm.profs.bees_are_animals.desc: Whether Bee House products should be affected by Producer bonuses.
gmcm.profs.forages_needed_for_best_quali: Ecologists must forage this many items to reach iridium quality.
gmcm.profs.minerals_needed_for_best_qual: Gemologists must mine this many minerals to reach iridium quality.
gmcm.profs.crystalarium_upgrades_with_ge: Whether or not to increase the quality of active Crystalarium-held minerals when the owner Gemologist receives a quality boost.
gmcm.profs.chance_to_start_treasure_hunt: The chance that your Scavenger or Prospector hunt senses will start to tingling.
gmcm.profs.allow_scavenger_hunts_on_farm: Whether a Scavenger Hunt can trigger while entering the farm map.
gmcm.profs.scavenger_hunt_handicap.title: Scavenger Hunt Handicap
gmcm.profs.scavenger_hunt_handicap.desc: Increase this number if you find that Scavenger hunts end too quickly.
gmcm.profs.prospector_hunt_handicap.desc: Increase this number if you find that Prospector hunts end too quickly.
gmcm.profs.treasure_detection_distance.d: How close you must be to the treasure tile to reveal it's location, in tiles.
gmcm.profs.spelunker_speed_ceiling.title: Spelunker Speed Ceiling
gmcm.profs.spelunker_speed_ceiling.desc: The maximum speed a Spelunker can reach in the mines.
gmcm.profs.enable_get_excited.title: Enable 'Get Excited' Buff
gmcm.profs.enable_get_excited.desc: Whether to trigger the 'Get Excited' buff when a Demolitionist is hit by an explosion.
gmcm.profs.angler_price_bonus_ceiling.de: If multiple new fish mods are installed, you may want to adjust this to a sensible value. Limits the price multiplier for fish sold by Angler.
gmcm.profs.aquarist_fish_pond_ceiling.de: The maximum number of Fish Ponds that will be counted for Aquarist's fishing bonus. If you like raising dozens of fish species, you may use this to limit how easy the fishing minigame will become.
gmcm.profs.trash_per_tax_deduction.title: Trash per Tax Deduction %
gmcm.profs.trash_per_tax_deduction.desc: Conservationists must collect this much trash for every 1% tax deduction the following season.
gmcm.profs.trash_per_friendship_point.de: Conservationists must collect this much trash for every 1 friendship point towards villagers.
gmcm.profs.tax_deduction_ceiling.title: Tax Deduction Ceiling
gmcm.profs.tax_deduction_ceiling.desc: The maximum tax deduction allowed by the Ferngill Revenue Service (ignored with TXS module).
gmcm.profs.piper_buff_ceiling.title: Piper Buff Ceiling
gmcm.profs.piper_buff_ceiling.desc: The maximum stacks that can be gained for each buffed-stat gained by Piper.
gmcm.profs.limit.heading: Limit Break
gmcm.profs.limit.enable.title: Enable Limit Break
gmcm.profs.limit.enable.desc: Must be enabled to allow using Limit Breaks.
gmcm.profs.limit.hold_to_activate.title: Hold-To-Activate
gmcm.profs.limit.hold_to_activate.desc: If enabled, the Limit Break will be activated by holding the Activation Key for a short interval, instead of activating immediately.
gmcm.profs.limit.activation_key.title: Activation Key
gmcm.profs.limit.activation_key.desc: The key used to activate the Limit Break.
gmcm.profs.limit.activation_delay.title: Activation Delay
gmcm.profs.limit.activation_delay.desc: How long the key should be held before the Limit Break is activated, in seconds.
gmcm.profs.limit.gain_factor.title: Gain Factor
gmcm.profs.limit.gain_factor.desc: Affects the rate at which one builds the Limit Break gauge (higher is faster).
gmcm.profs.limit.drain_factor.title: Drain Factor
gmcm.profs.limit.drain_factor.desc: Affects the rate at which the Limit Break gauge depletes while activated (higher is faster).
gmcm.profs.limit.respec_cost.title: Cost of Limit Break Respec
gmcm.profs.limit.respec_cost.desc: The gold cost of changing the chosen Limit Break at the Statue of Prestige. Set to 0 to change for free.
gmcm.profs.limit.gauge_x_offset.title: Limit Gauge X Offset
gmcm.profs.limit.gauge_y_offset.title: Limit Gauge Y Offset
gmcm.profs.limit.gauge_offset.desc: Use this to adjust the position of the Limit Gauge if using other mods which add HUD bars.
gmcm.profs.prestige.heading: Skill Reset & Prestige
gmcm.profs.prestige.enable.title: Enable Prestige
gmcm.profs.prestige.enable.desc: Must be enabled to allow all prestige modifications.
gmcm.profs.prestige.skill_reset_cost_mul: Multiplies the base cost reseting a skill at the Statue of Prestige. Set to 0 to reset for free.
gmcm.profs.prestige.forget_recipes.title: Forget Recipes on Skill Reset
gmcm.profs.prestige.forget_recipes.desc: Disable this to keep all skill recipes upon skill reseting.
gmcm.profs.prestige.allow_multiple_prest: Whether the player can use the Statue of Prestige more than once in a day.
gmcm.profs.prestige.exp_multiplier.title: Bonus Skill Exp After Reset
gmcm.profs.prestige.exp_multiplier.desc: Cumulative bonus that multiplies a skill's experience gain after each respective skill reset.
gmcm.profs.prestige.respec_cost.title: Cost of Prestige Respec
gmcm.profs.prestige.respec_cost.desc: Monetary cost of respecing prestige profession choices for a skill. Set to 0 to respec for free.
gmcm.profs.prestige.progression_style.de: Determines the style of the sprite that appears next to skill bars, and indicates the skill reset progression.
gmcm.profs.prestige.raised_level_cap.des: Must be enabled to allow progression until level 20.
gmcm.profs.prestige.required_exp_per_ext: How much skill experience is required for each level-up above level 10.
gmcm.profs.experience.heading: Skill Experience
gmcm.profs.experience.base_exp_multiplie: Multiplies all skill experience gained for {{skill}} from the start of the game.
gmcm.cmbt.heading: CMBT Module Settings
gmcm.cmbt.general.heading: General Combat Settings
gmcm.cmbt.enable_status_conditions.title: Enable Status Conditions
gmcm.cmbt.enable_status_conditions.desc: Whether to enable status conditions like Burn and Stun on enemies. These are used by other modules.
gmcm.cmbt.overhauled_defense.title: Overhauled Defense
gmcm.cmbt.overhauled_defense.desc: Replaces the linear damage mitigation formula with an exponential formula for better scaling.
gmcm.cmbt.knockback_damage.title: Knockback Damage
gmcm.cmbt.knockback_damage.desc: Causes enemies to suffer collision damage when knocked-back into a wall or other obstacle.
gmcm.cmbt.critical_back_attacks.title: Critical Back Attacks
gmcm.cmbt.critical_back_attacks.desc: Your attacks on enemies facing away from you gain double crit. chance.
gmcm.cmbt.enchantments.heading: Gemstones & Enchantments
gmcm.cmbt.enchantments.rebalanced_gemsto: Improves certain underwhelming gemstone effects in both rings and weapon forges.
gmcm.cmbt.enchantments.new.title: Use New Enchantments
gmcm.cmbt.enchantments.new.desc: Replaces boring vanilla weapon enchantments with entirely new, objectively better ones. Includes enchantments for both melee weapons and slingshots.
gmcm.cmbt.items.title: Feature-specific settings:
gmcm.cmbt.enable_overhaul.title: Enable Weapon Overhaul
gmcm.cmbt.enable_overhaul.desc: Rebalances every melee weapon and slingshot, in addition to changing Mine chests, monster and container drops, weapon shops and more.
gmcm.cmbt.melee.heading: Melee Weapons
gmcm.cmbt.melee.combo.heading: Combo Settings
Replaces vanilla weapon spam with a more strategic combo system.
gmcm.cmbt.melee.combo.swipe_hold.title: Enable Hold-To-Swipe
gmcm.cmbt.melee.combo.swipe_hold.desc: Allows performing combos by simply holding the tool button instead of spam-clicking.
The max. number of consecutive hits in a Stabbing Sword combo (if Stabbing Swords are enabled).
gmcm.cmbt.melee.combo.defense_sword_hits: The max. number of consecutive hits in a Defensive Sword combo.
gmcm.cmbt.melee.combo.club_hits.title: Club Combo Hits
gmcm.cmbt.melee.combo.club_hits.desc: The max. number of consecutive hits in a Club combo.
gmcm.cmbt.melee.sword.heading: Sword Settings
gmcm.cmbt.melee.sword.enable_stabby.desc: Replaces the defensive special move of some swords with an offensive lunge move.
gmcm.cmbt.melee.sword.defense_improves_p: Parry damage will increase for each point in defense.
gmcm.cmbt.melee.club.heading: Club Settings
gmcm.cmbt.melee.club.grounded_club_smash: A club smash AoE will inflict guaranteed critical damage on burrowed enemies, but completely miss flying enemies.
gmcm.cmbt.ranged.heading: Ranged Weapons
gmcm.cmbt.ranged.enable_critical_hits.de: Allows slingshots to deal critical damage and be affected by critical modifiers.
gmcm.cmbt.ranged.enable_special_move.des: Enables a custom stunning smack special move for slingshots.
gmcm.cmbt.ranged.remove_grace_period.des: Allows slingshot projectiles to hit targets before the 100-ms grace period.
gmcm.cmbt.ranged.enable_infinity_slingsh: Allows creating the Infinity Slingshot at the Forge.
gmcm.cmbt.rings.heading: Combat Rings
gmcm.cmbt.rings.rebalance_rings.title: Rebalanced Rings
gmcm.cmbt.rings.craftable_gem_rings.desc: Adds new combat recipes for crafting gemstone rings.
gmcm.cmbt.rings.infinity.heading: The One Infinity Band
gmcm.cmbt.rings.infinity.disclaimer: WARNING: Enabling or disabling the Infinity Band make cause a Json Shuffle on existing saves.
gmcm.cmbt.rings.infinity.enable.title: Enable Infinity Band
gmcm.cmbt.rings.infinity.enable.desc: Replaces the Iridium Band recipe and effect, allowing the creation of Infinity Bands at the Forge. Requires a restart to take effect.
gmcm.cmbt.rings.resonance.enable.title: Enable Gemstone Resonance
gmcm.cmbt.rings.resonance.enable.desc: Allows gemstones to harmonize and resonate in close proximity of each other.
gmcm.cmbt.rings.resonance.colorful.title: Colorful Resonance Glow
gmcm.cmbt.rings.resonance.colorful.desc: Whether the glow light of resonating chords should take after the root note's color.
gmcm.cmbt.rings.resonance.light_source.d: The texture that will be used to determine the shape of the resonance glow.
gmcm.cmbt.quests.heading: Quests
gmcm.cmbt.quests.woody_replaces_rusty.de: Replaces the starting Rusty Sword with a Wooden Blade.
gmcm.cmbt.quests.dwarvish_legacy.disclai: WARNING: Enabling or disabling the Dwarven Legacy may cause a Json Shuffle on existing saves.
gmcm.cmbt.quests.dwarvish_legacy.title: Dwarvish Legacy
gmcm.cmbt.quests.dwarvish_legacy.desc: Allows crafting Masterwork weapons by uncovering ancient Dwarvish blueprints. Requires a restart to take effect.
gmcm.cmbt.quests.enable_hero_quest.discl: WARNING: Enabling or disabling the Hero Quest may cause a Json Shuffle on existing saves.
gmcm.cmbt.quests.enable_hero_quest.title: Enable Hero Quest
gmcm.cmbt.quests.enable_hero_quest.desc: Introduces a new quest for the ultimate Infinity +1 weapons. Requires a restart to take effect.
gmcm.cmbt.quests.iridium_bars_per_galaxy: The number of Iridium Bars required to receive a Galaxy weapon.
gmcm.cmbt.quests.ruin_blade_dot_multipli: Multiplies the Ruined Blade's damage-over-time effect for greater or lower damage (smaller is lower).
gmcm.cmbt.quests.can_store_ruin_blade.de: Whether the Ruined Blade can be stored in chests.
gmcm.cmbt.quests.difficulty.title: Virtue Trial Difficulty
gmcm.cmbt.quests.difficulty.desc: The general difficulty for completing each of the Virtue Trials. Changing this setting will immediately update your quest progress!!
gmcm.cmbt.enemies.heading: Monsters
gmcm.cmbt.enemies.health_multiplier.desc: Multiplies the health of all enemies.
gmcm.cmbt.enemies.damage_multiplier.desc: Multiplies the damage dealt by all enemies.
gmcm.cmbt.enemies.defense_multiplier.des: Multiplies the damage resistance of all enemies.
gmcm.cmbt.enemies.health_summand.title: Monster Health Summand
gmcm.cmbt.enemies.health_summand.desc: Adds to the health of all enemies (before multiplier).
gmcm.cmbt.enemies.damage_summand.title: Monster Damage Summand
gmcm.cmbt.enemies.damage_summand.desc: Adds to the damage dealt by all enemies (before multiplier).
gmcm.cmbt.enemies.defense_summand.title: Monster Defense Summand
gmcm.cmbt.enemies.defense_summand.desc: Adds to the damage resistance of all enemies (before multiplier).
gmcm.cmbt.enemies.varied_encounters.desc: Randomizes monster stats, subject to Daily Luck bias, adding variability to monster encounters.
The chosen melee weapon, if any, will be automatically equipped when a monster enters this range in tiles.
The chosen ranged weapon, if any, will be automatically equipped when a monster enters this range in tiles.
gmcm.cmbt.ui.color_coded.desc: Whether to colorize item names according to tier or unique status.
gmcm.cmbt.ui.sockets.draw.title: Draw Gemstone Forge Sockets
gmcm.cmbt.ui.sockets.draw.desc: Repalces the generic vanilla "Forged" text in weapon tooltips with actual gemstone socket icons.
gmcm.cmbt.ui.sockets.style.title: Forge Socket Style
gmcm.cmbt.ui.sockets.style.desc: Determines the style of the sprite used to represent gemstone forges in tooltips, if enabled.
gmcm.cmbt.ui.sockets.pos.title: Forge Socket Position
gmcm.cmbt.ui.sockets.pos.desc: Determines the relative position where forge sockets should be drawn, if enabled.
gmcm.cmbt.ui.tooltips.style.title: Tooltip Style
gmcm.cmbt.ui.tooltips.style.desc: Whether to display weapon stats as their absolute values or as relative to other weapons of the same type.
gmcm.cmbt.ui.draw_ammo.title: Display Current Ammo
gmcm.cmbt.ui.draw_ammo.desc: Draws the currently-selected ammo for a ranged weapon. Useful when equipping multiple ammo.
gmcm.cmbt.ui.bullseye_cursor.title: Bullseye Replaces Cursor
gmcm.cmbt.ui.bullseye_cursor.desc: Draws a bulls-eye instead of the mouse cursor while firing a slingshot. Does not support pull-back firing for obvious reasons.
gmcm.tols.heading: TOLS Settings
gmcm.tols.specific.title: Specific tool settings:
gmcm.tols.enable_forge_upgrading.title: Enable Forge Upgrading
gmcm.tols.enable_forge_upgrading.desc: Whether to enable upgrading tools at the Volcano Forge.
gmcm.tols.base_stamina_cost_multiplier.d: Adjusts the base stamina cost of the {{tool}}.
gmcm.tols.charging.heading: Charging Settings
gmcm.tols.charging.hold.title: Hold-To-Charge
gmcm.tols.charging.hold.desc: Whether charging requires holding down a mod key (useful to preserve the tool-spam feature of vanilla).
gmcm.tols.charging.key.title: The key used for charging resource tools, if hold-to-charge is enabled.
gmcm.tols.charging.key.desc: The key used for charging resource tools, if hold-to-charge is enabled.
gmcm.tols.charging.enable.title: Enable {{tool}} Charging
gmcm.tols.charging.req_upgrade.title: Min. Upgrade for Charging
gmcm.tols.charging.req_upgrade.desc: The {{tool}} must be at least this level in order to be charged.
gmcm.tols.charging.charged_stamina_cost_: Adjusts the stamina cost of charging.
gmcm.tols.charging.copper_radius.title: Copper Radius
gmcm.tols.charging.copper_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles for the Copper upgrade.
gmcm.tols.charging.steel_radius.title: Steel Radius
gmcm.tols.charging.steel_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles for the Steel upgrade.
gmcm.tols.charging.gold_radius.title: Gold Radius
gmcm.tols.charging.gold_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles for the Gold upgrade.
gmcm.tols.charging.iridium_radius.title: Iridium Radius
gmcm.tols.charging.iridium_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles for the Iridium upgrade.
gmcm.tols.charging.radioactive_radius.de: The radius of affected tiles for the Radioactive upgrade.
gmcm.tols.charging.mythicite_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles for the Mythicite upgrade.
gmcm.tols.charging.enchanted_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles for a fully-upgraded {{tool}} with the Reaching enchantment.
gmcm.tols.tiles.heading: Affected Tile Settings
gmcm.tols.tiles.enable.title: Enable Affected Tile Overrides
gmcm.tols.tiles.enable.desc: This must be enabled for the overrides below to take effect. Disabled by default to improve performance.
gmcm.tols.tiles.copper_length.title: Copper Length
gmcm.tols.tiles.copper_length.desc: The length of affected tiles for the Copper upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.copper_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles to either side of the farmer for the Copper upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.steel_length.title: Steel Length
gmcm.tols.tiles.steel_length.desc: The length of affected tiles for the Steel upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.steel_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles to either side of the farmer for the Steel upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.gold_length.title: Gold Length
gmcm.tols.tiles.gold_length.desc: The length of affected tiles for the Gold upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.gold_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles to either side of the farmer for the Gold upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.iridium_length.title: Iridium Length
gmcm.tols.tiles.iridium_length.desc: The length of affected tiles for the Iridium upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.iridium_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles to either side of the farmer for the Iridium upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.radioactive_length.title: Radioactive Length
gmcm.tols.tiles.radioactive_length.desc: The length of affected tiles for the Radioactive upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.radioactive_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles to either side of the farmer for the Radioactive upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.mythicite_length.title: Mythicite Length
gmcm.tols.tiles.mythicite_length.desc: The length of affected tiles for the Mythicite upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.mythicite_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles to either side of the farmer for the Mythicite upgrade.
gmcm.tols.tiles.enchanted_length.title: Reaching Length
gmcm.tols.tiles.enchanted_length.desc: The length of affected tiles for the fully-upgraded {{tool}} with Reaching enchantment.
gmcm.tols.tiles.enchanted_radius.desc: The radius of affected tiles to either side of the farmer for the fully-upgraded {{tool}} with reaching enchantment.
gmcm.tols.tiles.scythe.regular_radius.de: Sets the affected tile radius of the regular Scythe.
gmcm.tols.tiles.scythe.gold_radius.title: Golden Scythe Radius
gmcm.tols.tiles.scythe.gold_radius.desc: Sets the affected tile radius of the Golden Scythe.
gmcm.tols.shockwave.heading: Shockwave Settings
gmcm.tols.shockwave.ticks_between_crests: The time between each crest in a shockwave, in game ticks. Lower values make the shockwave travel faster. Set to 0 for instant.
gmcm.tols.shockwave.clear_debris.title: Clear Debris
gmcm.tols.shockwave.axe.clear_fruit_tree: Whether to clear fruit tree seeds.
Whether to clear fruit trees that aren't fully grown.
gmcm.tols.shockwave.axe.cut_grown_fruit_: Whether to cut down fully-grown fruit trees.
gmcm.tols.shockwave.axe.clear_tree_seeds: Whether to clear non-fruit tree seeds.
gmcm.tols.shockwave.axe.clear_tree_sapli: Whether to clear non-fruit trees that aren't fully grown.
Whether to cut down fully-grown non-fruit trees.
gmcm.tols.shockwave.axe.cut_tapped_trees: Whether to cut down non-fruit trees that have a tapper.
gmcm.tols.shockwave.axe.clear_debris.des: Whether to clear debris like twigs, giant stumps, fallen logs and weeds.
gmcm.tols.shockwave.pick.break_boulders_: Whether to break boulders and meteorites.
gmcm.tols.shockwave.pick.harvest_mine_sp: Whether to harvest spawned items in the mines..
gmcm.tols.shockwave.pick.break_mine_cont: Whether to break containers in the mines.
Whether to clear placed paths & flooring.
gmcm.tols.shockwave.pick.clear_debris.de: Whether to clear debris like stones, boulders and weeds.
gmcm.tols.shockwave.playanimation.title: Play Shockwave Animation
gmcm.tols.shockwave.playanimation.desc: Whether to play the shockwave animation when the charge is released.
gmcm.tols.enchantments.heading: Enchantment Settings
gmcm.tols.enchantments.reaching.title: Allow Reaching Enchantment
gmcm.tols.enchantments.reaching.desc: Whether the {{tool}} can be enchanted with Reaching.
gmcm.tols.enchantments.swift.title: Allow Swift Enchantment
gmcm.tols.enchantments.swift.desc: Whether the {{tool}} can be enchanted with Switfing.
gmcm.tols.enchantments.master.title: Allow Master Enchantment
gmcm.tols.enchantments.master.desc: Whether the {{tool}} can be enchanted with Master.
gmcm.tols.enchantments.haymaker.title: Allow Haymaker Enchantment
gmcm.tols.enchantments.haymaker.desc: Whether the scythe can be enchanted with Haymaker.
gmcm.tols.can.exp_reward_chance.title: Chance to Reward Experience
gmcm.tols.can.exp_reward_chance.desc: The chance to reward farming experience when watering a cropped tile.
gmcm.tols.can.exp_reward_amount.title: Amount of Experience Reward
gmcm.tols.can.exp_reward_amount.desc: The amount of farming experience rewarded for watering a cropped tile.
Prevents refilling the Watering Can with salt or ocean water.
gmcm.tols.scythe.harvest.heading: Harvesting Settings
gmcm.tols.scythe.harvest.crops.title: Harvest Crops
gmcm.tols.scythe.harvest.crops.desc: Whether to harvest crops with the Scythe.
gmcm.tols.scythe.harvest.flowers.title: Harvest Flowers
gmcm.tols.scythe.harvest.flowers.desc: Whether to harvest crops with the Scythe.
gmcm.tols.scythe.harvest.forage.title: Harvest Forage
gmcm.tols.scythe.harvest.forage.desc: Whether to harvest forage with the Scythe.
gmcm.tols.scythe.harvest.goldonly.title: Golden Scythe Only
gmcm.tols.scythe.harvest.goldonly.desc: Whether to limit crop and flower harvesting to the Golden Scythe.
gmcm.tols.ui.color_coded.desc: Whether to colorize tool names according to upgrade level.
gmcm.tols.ui.hide_affected_tiles.title: Hide Affected Tiles
gmcm.tols.ui.hide_affected_tiles.desc: Whether to hide the affected tiles overlay while charging tools.
gmcm.pnds.heading: PNDS Settings
gmcm.pnds.days_until_algae_spawn.title: Days Until Algae Spawn
gmcm.pnds.days_until_algae_spawn.desc: The number of days until an empty pond will begin spawning algae.
gmcm.pnds.roe_production_chance_multipli: Multiplies a fish's base chance to produce roe each day.
gmcm.pnds.roe_always_fish_quality.title: Roe Always Fish Quality
gmcm.pnds.roe_always_fish_quality.desc: If true, then the quality of produced roe is always the same as the quality of the producing fish. If false, then the quality will be a random value less than or equal to that of the producing fish.
gmcm.txs.heading: TXS Settings
gmcm.txs.annualinterest.title: Annual Intereset
gmcm.txs.annualinterest.desc: The interest rate charged annually over any outstanding debt. Interest is accrued daily at a rate of 1/112 the annual rate.
gmcm.txs.income.heading: Income Tax
gmcm.txs.income.brackets.title: Income Brackets
gmcm.txs.income.brackets.desc: The income thresholds that determine each tax bracket. You can set a single very high value to disable income taxes entirely.
gmcm.txs.income.tax_per_bracket.title: Tax per Brackets
gmcm.txs.income.tax_per_bracket.desc: The taxable percentage of income at (up to) each bracket. If there are n brackets, this array should contain n+1 values. You can set all values to zero to disable income taxes entirely.
gmcm.txs.income.lateness_fine.title: Lateness Fine
gmcm.txs.income.lateness_fine.desc: A one-time penalty rate charged over the unpaid amount when income taxes are not paid on-time.
gmcm.txs.income.deductible_animal_expens: What percentage of gold spent on animal purchases and supplies should be tax-deductible.
gmcm.txs.income.deductible_building_expe: What percentage of gold spent constructing farm buildings is tax-deductible.
gmcm.txs.income.deductible_seed_expenses: What percentage of gold spent on seed purchases should be tax-deductible.
gmcm.txs.income.deductible_tool_expenses: What percentage of gold spent on tool purchases and upgrades should be tax-deductible.
gmcm.txs.property.heading: Property Tax
gmcm.txs.property.lateness_fine.title: Lateness Fine
gmcm.txs.property.lateness_fine.desc: A one-time penalty rate charged once over the unpaid amount, when property taxes are not paid on-time.
gmcm.txs.property.used_tile_tax_rate.des: The tax rate charged over a tile actively used for agriculture, livestock or forestry.
gmcm.txs.property.unused_tile_tax_rate.d: The tax rate charged over a tile not actively used for productive means.
gmcm.txs.property.building_tile_tax_rate: The tax rate charged over a tile occupied by a constructed building (magical buildings are.
gmcm.txs.property.exempt_magical_buildin: Whether or not magical buildings (i.e., those summoned at the Wizard's Tower) are exempt from property taxes.
gmcm.twx.heading: TWX Settings
gmcm.twx.aging.deterministic.title: Deterministic Age Quality
gmcm.twx.aging.deterministic.desc: Whether age-dependent qualities should be deterministic (true) or stochastic (false).
gmcm.twx.aging.bee_house.title: Bee House Aging Factor
gmcm.twx.aging.bee_house.desc: The degree to which Bee House age improves honey quality. Lower values mean that more time is needed for honey to improve. Set to zero to disable quality honey.
gmcm.twx.aging.tea_bush.title: Tea Bush Aging Factor
gmcm.twx.aging.tea_bush.desc: The degree to which Tea Bush age improves tea leaf quality. Lower values mean that more time is needed for tea leaves to improve. Set to zero to disable quality tea leaves.
gmcm.twx.aging.tree.title: Tree Aging Factor
gmcm.twx.aging.tree.desc: The degree to which Tree age improves sap quality. Lower values mean that more time is needed for sap to improve. Set to zero to disable quality sap.
gmcm.twx.aging.fruit_tree.title: Fruit Tree Aging Factor
gmcm.twx.aging.fruit_tree.desc: The degree to which Fruit Tree age improves fruit quality. Lower values mean that more time is needed for fruits to improve. Set to zero to disable quality fruits.
gmcm.twx.aging.mushroom_box.title: Mushroom Box Aging Factor
gmcm.twx.aging.mushroom_box.desc: The degree to which Mushroom Box age improves mushroom quality. Lower values mean that more time is needed for mushrooms to improve. Set to zero to disable quality mushrooms.
gmcm.twx.experience.berry_bush.title: Berry Bush Exp Reward
gmcm.twx.experience.berry_bush.desc: The amount of Foraging experience rewarded when a berry bush is harvested. Set to zero to disable.
gmcm.twx.experience.mushroom_box.title: Mushroom Box Exp Reward
gmcm.twx.experience.mushroom_box.desc: The amount of Foraging experience rewarded when a Mushroom Box is harvested. Set to zero to disable.
gmcm.twx.experience.tapper.title: Tapper Exp Reward
gmcm.twx.experience.tapper.desc: The amount of Foraging experience rewarded when a Tapper is harvested. Set to zero to disable.
gmcm.twx.farming.crop_wither_chance.desc: The chance for a crop to wither per day left un-watered.
gmcm.twx.farming.prevent_fruit_tree_wint: Regular trees can't grow in winter. Why should fruit trees be any different?
gmcm.twx.farming.largedairy_yield.title: Large Dairy Yields Quantity Over Quality
gmcm.twx.farming.largedairy_yield.desc: Causes one large egg or milk to produce two mayonnaise or cheese but at regular quality, instead of one at gold quality.
gmcm.twx.farming.spawn_crows.title: Spawn Crows on These Maps:
gmcm.twx.fishing.trash_does_not_consume_: Prevents bait consumption when a Crab Pot produces trash.
gmcm.twx.mining.chain_explosions.title: Chain Explosions
gmcm.twx.mining.chain_explosions.desc: Bombs within any explosion radius immediately explode themselves.
gmcm.twx.mining.immersive_glowstone_prog: Replaces the glowstone ring recipe with one that makes sense, and adds complementary recipes for its constituents.
gmcm.controls.heading: Control Settings
gmcm.controls.modkey.title: Mod Key
gmcm.controls.face_mouse_cursor.title: Face Towards Mouse Cursor
gmcm.controls.face_mouse_cursor.desc: If using mouse and keyboard, turn to face towards the current cursor position before swinging.
gmcm.controls.slick_moves.title: Slick Moves
gmcm.controls.slick_moves.desc: Drift in the current running direction when swinging a weapon.
gmcm.controls.enable_auto_selection.desc: The highlighted {{selected}} will be automatically equipped when appropriate.
gmcm.controls.selection_key.title: Selection Key
gmcm.controls.selection_key.desc: Hold this key to toggle a {{tool}} for auto-selection, if enabled.
gmcm.controls.selection_border_color.des: The color used to indicate the chosen auto-selectable {{chosen}}.
gmcm.ui.heading: User-Interface Settings
gmcm.ui.color_coded.title: Color-Coded for Your Convenience
